skills.title: HTML5
skills.description: Latest version of the Hypertext Markup Language used to create web pages and applications with enhanced multimedia and interactivity capabilities.

skills.title: CSS3
skills.description: Latest version of Cascading Style Sheets that adds advanced styling features like gradients, animations, and responsive design to web pages.

skills.title: JavaScript
skills.description: High-level programming language used to create interactive and dynamic web pages and web applications. It runs on both client and server sides.

skills.title: TypeScript
skills.description: Open-source programming language and superset of JavaScript that adds optional static typing, class-based object-oriented programming, and other features.

skills.title: ReactJs
skills.description: JavaScript library used to build user interfaces and reusable UI components for web and mobile applications with a declarative and efficient approach.

skills.title: Next.js
skills.description: React-based open-source framework used to build server-side rendered web applications with automatic code splitting, optimized performance, and developer-friendly features.

skills.title: React Context
skills.description: React API used to share data across components without passing props explicitly, allowing for a more streamlined and efficient data flow in the component tree.

skills.title: Redux
skills.description: Open-source JavaScript library used for state management in complex web applications. It provides a centralized store to manage application data and allows for predictable and maintainable state changes.

skills.title: Material UI
skills.description: React-based open-source library that provides pre-built components and themes based on Google's Material Design principles for building attractive and responsive user interfaces.

skills.title: Styled Components
skills.description: Open-source library for styling React components using CSS syntax inside JavaScript code. It provides scoped styling, dynamic theming, and other advanced features.

skills.title: Sass
skills.description: Preprocessor scripting language used to create more organized and efficient CSS stylesheets. It adds features like variables, mixins, and nested rules to standard CSS.

skills.title: Tailwind CSS
skills.description: Utility-first open-source CSS framework that provides pre-built and customizable CSS classes for rapidly designing modern and responsive web interfaces.

skills.title: Framer Motion
skills.description: hhOpen-source React library for creating smooth and flexible animations and interactive user interfaces using simple and declarative syntax.

skills.title: Git
skills.description: Free and open-source distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code during software development. It enables collaborative and efficient code management.

skills.title: npm
skills.description: Package manager for Node.js and JavaScript that provides access to a vast collection of open-source libraries and tools. It simplifies the process of installing, sharing, and managing dependencies in web development.

skills.title: Figma
skills.description: Cloud-based design and prototyping tool used for creating and collaborating on user interfaces, graphics, and other design projects. It provides a streamlined workflow and real-time collaboration features.

softSkills.title: Communication Skills
softSkills.description: The ability to articulate and understand information, ideas, and emotions through verbal, nonverbal, and written methods in various contexts.

softSkills.title: Collaboration
softSkills.description: The act of working cooperatively with others towards a common goal, while valuing diverse perspectives, sharing responsibility, and communicating effectively.

softSkills.title: Adaptability
softSkills.description: The ability to adjust and thrive in changing circumstances or situations, by being flexible, open-minded, and able to learn and grow from experience.

softSkills.title: Time Management
softSkills.description: The ability to effectively plan, prioritize, and manage one's time and tasks, in order to achieve goals efficiently and effectively.

softSkills.title: Creativity
softSkills.description: The ability to generate unique and innovative ideas or solutions using imagination and originality.

softSkills.title: Continuous Learning
softSkills.description: The desire and ability to acquire new knowledge, skills, and perspectives throughout one's life.
